com.mapgroup.classificator.tree

Class SplitNode.SplitInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.tree.SplitNode.SplitInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    SplitNode

    public class SplitNode.SplitInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains all the information about the split node.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int beginIndex
      starter index of the subset defined by the split node
      private java.lang.String comparator
      Order relationship defined on discrete attribute
      private int endIndex
      last index of the subset defined by the split node
      private int numberChild
      Number of split node(child nodes) generated from this split node
      private java.lang.Object splitValue
      Independent attribute value which defines a split

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SplitNode.SplitInfo(java.lang.Object splitValue, int beginIndex, int endIndex, int numberChild)
      Constructs this split node initializing all its attributes.
      SplitNode.SplitInfo(java.lang.Object splitValue, int beginIndex, int endIndex, int numberChild, java.lang.String comparator)
      Constructs this split node initializing all its attributes and specifying an order relationship for them.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBeginIndex()
      Returns the starter index of the dataset's subset defined by this split node.
      java.lang.String getComparator()
      Returns the order relationship defined for this split node.
      int getEndIndex()
      Returns the last index of the dataset's subset defined by this split node.
      java.lang.Object getSplitValue()
      Returns the value associated to this split node.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of this split node which displays all the information contained in it, such as, the number of its child nodes, the order relationship defined on it and its value.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SplitNode.SplitInfo

        SplitNode.SplitInfo(java.lang.Object splitValue,
                   int beginIndex,
                   int endIndex,
                   int numberChild)
        Constructs this split node initializing all its attributes.

        This specific constructor is used only for discrete attributes because the default order relationship is used.

        Parameters:
        splitValue - attribute's value that defines the split
        beginIndex - starter index of the partition
        endIndex - last index of the partition
        numberChild - number of child node defined

      • SplitNode.SplitInfo

        SplitNode.SplitInfo(java.lang.Object splitValue,
                   int beginIndex,
                   int endIndex,
                   int numberChild,
                   java.lang.String comparator)
        Constructs this split node initializing all its attributes and specifying an order relationship for them.
        Parameters:
        splitValue - attribute's value that defines the split
        beginIndex - starter index of the partition
        endIndex - last index of the partition
        numberChild - number of child node defined
        comparator - order relationship specified
